scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE dbo.ACDOCA_CDC_SCD2
WITH
(	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [BELNR], [DOCLN],[RBUKRS],[GJAHR],[RLDNR],[RCLNT] ),
	
	PARTITION   (   [GJAHR] RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES
                    (2017,2018,2019,2020,2021,2022,2023))
)
AS
SELECT * FROM dbo.ACDOCA_SCD2
